# This file is autogenerated
title: create

slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/create
---

Creates a new AuthClient instance

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Parameters

### params

`AuthClientParams`

- Configuration parameters for the auth client

### params.apiKey

`string`

- API key for authentication with Alchemy services

### params.jwt

`string`

- JWT token for authentication with Alchemy services

### params.url

`string`

- Custom URL (optional - defaults to Alchemy's chain-agnostic URL)

### params.rpId

`string`

- Relying Party ID for WebAuthn operations

### params.createTekStamper

`CreateTekStamperFn`

- Function to create a TEK stamper

### params.createWebAuthnStamper

`CreateWebAuthnStamperFn`

- Function to create a WebAuthn stamper

### params.handleOauthFlow

`HandleOauthFlowFn`

- Function to handle OAuth authentication flow

## Returns

`AuthClient`
A new AuthClient instance
